desc:
Post 1666
- Set Color: Wine
- When you play this, Force a player to draw 1 card.
- While this is in a personal status, Whenever you play a <:monopoly:1171651746762866799> , You may spend 1 ðŸ’¸ to force another player to draw 1 card.

- For each house bought, Increase the number of cards drawn by 1 for the on-play effect.

- For each skyscraper bought, Increase the number of cards drawn by 1 for the personal status effect.
